enb_long_title: Eleventh Session of The INC for the Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
section_title: AGENDA ITEM 4 - REVIEW OF ANNEXES TO THE CONVENTION
sentences: On Wednesday, 8 February 1995, the Czech Republic announced that his Government should be prepared to amend Annex I at COP-2.
In response to a question from Japan, the Chair said Czechoslovakia was an Annex I country and since it has been succeeded by two countries, the annex has to be amended accordingly.
